snippet: Only 14 of the 456 said to have been aboard the Oriental Star have been found alive, and eight remain missing, the Chinese state news agency reported.

byline.contributor: Kiki Zhao contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Only 14 of the 456 said to have been aboard the Oriental Star have been found alive, and eight remain missing, the Chinese state news agency reported.

headline.main: Recovery of Bodies Brings Confirmed Toll in Yangtze Sinking to 434
